artist: Artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: landscape; blue image of thick falling snow over roofs; light in 3 windows at center
inscription: left margin: 昭和廿一年作 {Shōwa nijūichinen saku} (made in 1946) | bottom margin: Hasui Kawase
markings: LLC, red round artist\'s seal: 川セ {Kawase}; LLC, red round publisher seal A: ワタナベ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: The village of Shiobara in northern Tochigi Prefecture, famous for its hot springs, seems to have been one of Hasui’s favorite places. He featured it in eleven designs between 1918 and 1955.
title: Hataori in Shiobara
